projects.title: Raider Ride
projects.description: A taxi service app that is exclusively for Texas Tech University students. This application is designed to assist students without a vehicle to go to and from campus, and it's built with Flutter and Firebase.

projects.title: Quotes App
projects.description: Google Developer Student Club Flutter workshop project

projects.title: Sudoku Solver
projects.description: A program to solve any Sudoku puzzle in under 1 second

projects.title: Flixter
projects.description: iOS app that allows users to browse movies from the The Movie Database API

aboutpara: I'm pursuing my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science with a minor in Mathematics from Texas Tech University with an expected graduation in Fall 2023. Currently, I'm looking for a full-time opportunity as a Software Engineer

experiences.bullets: ‚Ä¢ Performed an experiment that increased the feedback accuracy of 2.2 million monthly active users by roughly 30% by updating the feedback email URLs along with the click events using Iterable platform ‚Ä¢ Optimized the backend in Kotlin by cleaning up the deprecated subscription product by disabling its records from related services that improved the speed performance of Gradle builds, and reduced the number of integration tests by 10% ‚Ä¢ Added a non-binary gender option for searching loans by updating GraphQL endpoints with new enumerated values, and deployed into production using Docker after performing integration testing in Jenkins ‚Ä¢ Collaborated with the ML team on improving the personalized lending feature and documented trade-offs to various approaches ‚Ä¢ Worked in an Agile environment with daily stand-ups, and retrospective meetings each sprint through the Jira board

experiences.position: IT Support Technician at Texas Tech University
experiences.bullets: ‚Ä¢ Run technical operations in ServiceNow and assisted 400+ faculty and students with software and hardware problems ‚Ä¢ Increased the customer satisfaction rate by 4.5% by troubleshooting issues on Windows, MacOS, Linux, iOS, and Android ‚Ä¢ Provided upper-level support for customer requests and incidents (400+ tickets), and assigned to appropriate Tier II groups

education.universityPara: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Minor in Mathematics (3.75 GPA)
